tests.description: Full type test suite for copper control / communication cables as per IEC/IS, including HV, insulation, mechanical and flammability tests
Acceptance tests for each lot of copper control / communication cables (HV test, insulation resistance, dimensional checks)
Full type test suite for HT XLPE power cables as per IS 7098 Part-II: dielectric, partial discharge, heating cycle, impulse withstand, flammability, mechanical tests
Acceptance tests for HT power cables for each lot (conductor tests, thickness, IR, HV, PD where applicable)
Routine tests per drum: conductor resistance, HV, armour resistance
Pre-delivery inspection at vendor works by client representative including witnessing tests as per ATP and issuing inspection release note
Certification of Cat6 STP cable up to 100/250 MHz including attenuation, NEXT, return loss and continuity tests
Qualification tests for PTFE equipment wire: dielectric test, insulation resistance, tensile and elongation tests
